content.review_title: Relaxing beach resort after a  2 week bike ride with Vietnam Adventure Cucling
content.review_content: After staying at a beautiful 5 star hotel up the beach with the ambiance of Europe it was wonderful to come to Seava resort! Check in with Uyen very smooth and informative. Shuttle to Saigon airport at checkout organised easily.  Mainly local people holiday here. The extensive well kept tropical gardens and lake are amazing. We enjoyed swimming in the beach with its warm waters and beach combing for shells. Local  fishing boats around emptying nets of prawns and fish were fun to watch.  The pool is huge and service by Phi at the bar was very friendly and professional.  Breakfast had everything one could imagine and our last dinner of prawns  and crab stir fry was the best weâ€™d had in Vietnam. Our server Thien luv spoke lovely English and was kind and helpful. Would recommend
